replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Bullehts,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nP6p7ElU,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-24T03:47:18.880+0000)
> Bullehts: Oh no!
> Bullehts: Reported!
> Bullehts: NOOOOO:
> Bullehts: PLEASE PLEASE DONT REPORT ME
> Bullehts: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
>Bullehts: Lol as if i give a shit.

Why write this post then?
What about the Jax and Taliyah games within the last week where you straight up inted/trolled? Anything to say about those?
uh dont talk like that man,  you are toxic {{champion:33}}

Saying things like kys is pretty highly frowned upon. I did pull up your account and it looks like there were several attempts to warn you about offensive language. With that being said, you can always reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we can go more in detail about what was said and why your account reached this point.
